title: Hiring: Total Station Surveyor
description: We are looking for a skilled Total Station Surveyor with at least 3 years of experience to join our team. If you have strong technical skills in survey equipment setup, data collection, and construction layout, we encourage you to apply.
content:
Join Our Team as a Total Station Surveyor

We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Total Station Surveyor to support our land surveying operations. This role is ideal for someone who is proficient with modern surveying technology and enjoys working in the field. The successful candidate will be responsible for conducting site surveys, setting out construction projects, and ensuring the accuracy of all measurements.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Set up and operate Total Station and GPS equipment.
  • Collect and process survey data.
  • Perform construction stakeouts and as-built surveys.
  • Collaborate with engineers and construction teams.
author: HR Team
